mainText:
I was saddened to here of the loss of Steve. His building of Apple has  
changed the lives of many people including myself. I utilize Apple  
technology daily and I know the pride he felt in the company. So many  
innovations have come from his genius. I know he will be greatly missed.
My sincere condolences to his family, friends and associates at Apple.

You are in my prayers.
author: Katheryn
